scenes.name: The Problem of Maria
scenes.summary: The nuns discuss the challenges and quirks of dealing with Maria's unconventional behavior.

characters.name: Maria
characters.quote: I want to sing all the time. I can't stop, wherever I am.

characters.name: Reverend Mother
characters.quote: Now, what do we really think of our child Maria?

characters.name: Sister Berthe
characters.quote: Perhaps we should put a cow bell around her neck.

scenes.name: Maria is Sent Away
scenes.summary: Reverend Mother decides to send Maria to the Von Trapp family as a governess.
scenes.firstLine: Come along everyone.  I must speak with Maria
scenes.lastLine: I will tell Captain von Trapp to expect you tomorrow.

characters.name: Maria
characters.quote: Reverend Mother I'm sorry. I couldn't help myself.

characters.name: Reverend Mother
characters.quote: Maria, considering it's you, I suggest you look in unusual places.

scenes.name: Maria Meets the Children
scenes.summary: Maria arrives at the Von Trapp house and is introduced to the children in a military-like manner by Captain Von Trapp.
scenes.firstLine: Children, This your new governess, Fr√§ulein Maria.
scenes.lastLine: Excuse me Captain, I don't know your signal.

characters.name: Maria
characters.quote: Oh, no, sir. I'm sorry, sir! I could never answer to a whistle.

characters.name: Captain Von Trapp
characters.quote: Well you don't look at all like a governess.

characters.name: Liesl
characters.quote: I'm Liesl, I'm 16 years old and I don't need a governess.

scenes.name: Maria Bonds with the Children
scenes.summary: Maria teaches the children to sing, transforming their rigid interactions into a playful and joyful experience.
scenes.firstLine: LET'S START AT THE VERY BEGINNING A VERY GOOD PLACE TO START
scenes.lastLine: That will bring us back to do!

characters.name: Maria
characters.quote: LET'S START AT THE VERY BEGINNING A VERY GOOD PLACE TO START

characters.name: Liesl
characters.quote: Is that what you call a song?

characters.name: Kurt
characters.quote: What's Incorrigible?

scenes.name: Thunderstorm Fears
scenes.summary: A thunderstorm scares the children, leading them to Maria's room where she comforts them with the song 'My Favorite Things.'
scenes.firstLine: You just stay right here with me. But where are the others?
scenes.lastLine: When I'm feeling sad I simply remember my favorite things And then I don't feel so bad.

characters.name: Maria
characters.quote: Whenever I'm feeling unhappy, I just try to think of nice things.

characters.name: Gretl
characters.quote: Why does the thunder get so mean, it makes me want to cry.

characters.name: Liesl
characters.quote: What kind of things?

scenes.name: Captain Returns and Discovers Changes
scenes.summary: Captain Von Trapp returns to find the children singing and wearing play clothes, challenging Maria's methods but eventually softening.
scenes.firstLine: What is going on in here!
scenes.lastLine: Captain, you have managed to remember that I am going out of town for two months, first thing in the morning.

characters.name: Captain Von Trapp
characters.quote: I told you strict bedtimes. Do you or do you not have difficulty following instructions?

characters.name: Maria
characters.quote: Only during thunderstorms.

characters.name: Liesl
characters.quote: Earlier I told you I didn't need a governess, Well maybe I do.

scenes.name: Maria Advocates for Change
scenes.summary: Maria confronts Captain Von Trapp about his strict parenting style and suggests changes, leading to a turning point in their relationship.
scenes.lastLine: Oh yes you are, captain! (Corrects himself) Fraulein.  Now you will pack your bags at once.

characters.name: Maria
characters.quote: Children cannot do things they are supposed to do if they have to worry about their precious clothes.

characters.name: Captain Von Trapp
characters.quote: I don't care to hear anything further from you about my children!

scenes.name: Party Preparations
scenes.summary: The household prepares for a grand party where Captain Von Trapp hopes to announce his engagement to the Baroness.
scenes.firstLine: Welcome home Captain! Oh you must be Baroness Schraeder.
scenes.lastLine: Come along now children, we have lots of planning.

characters.name: Captain Von Trapp
characters.quote: This is Baroness Schraeder...and these are my children.

characters.name: Baroness Schraeder
characters.quote: How do you do.

characters.name: Maria
characters.quote: Good evening Baroness. (she curtseys) If you'll excuse me. Come along children.

scenes.name: Maria Leaves
scenes.summary: After feeling out of place and overwhelmed by the situation, Maria decides to leave the Von Trapp family.
scenes.firstLine: Excuse me Captain. The children have prepared a song as a gift for the Baroness.
scenes.lastLine: I think he'll be married by the end of the summer.

characters.name: Maria
characters.quote: I am not finished yet, Captain!

characters.name: Captain Von Trapp
characters.quote: Oh yes you are, captain! (Corrects himself) Fraulein.  Now you will pack your bags at once.

scenes.name: Maria Returns
scenes.summary: Influenced by the Reverend Mother's counsel to face her problems, Maria returns to the Von Trapp family, ready to embrace her responsibilities.
scenes.firstLine: Maria, it seems that you will be leaving us for a while.
scenes.lastLine: I always try to keep faith in my doubt.

characters.name: Maria
characters.quote: If it is God's will.

characters.name: Reverend Mother
characters.quote: Maria, it seems that you will be leaving us for a while.

scenes.name: Reconciliation and Proposal
scenes.summary: Maria and Captain Von Trapp reconcile, sharing their feelings for each other, which culminates in a marriage proposal.
scenes.firstLine: Don't go. (beat) I've behaved badly. You were right. I don't know the children.
scenes.lastLine: I want you to stay. I ask you to stay.

characters.name: Maria
characters.quote: There's still time.

characters.name: Captain Von Trapp
characters.quote: Don't go. (beat) I've behaved badly. You were right. I don't know the children.

scenes.name: The Festival Performance
scenes.summary: The Von Trapp family performs at the Salzburg Festival, charming the audience with their singing, just before fleeing from the Nazis.
scenes.firstLine: Thank you. May I introduce the Family Von Trapp.
scenes.lastLine: That concludes our show. Please sit while the judges give us the winner of the show.

characters.name: Maria
characters.quote: THE HILLS ARE ALIVE WITH THE SOUND OF MUSIC

characters.name: Captain Von Trapp
characters.quote: SO LONG, FAREWELL, AUF WIEDERSEHEN, GOODBYE

characters.name: Max Detweiler
characters.quote: May I introduce the Family Von Trapp.

scenes.name: Escape Plan Unfolds
scenes.summary: After their performance, the Von Trapp family discreetly plans their escape from Austria to avoid Captain Von Trapp's forced enlistment in the Nazi Navy.
scenes.firstLine: Thank you everyone. That concludes our show. Please sit while the judges give us the winner of the show.
scenes.lastLine: They've offered me a commission in their Navy. I've been requested to report tomorrow morning.

characters.name: Captain Von Trapp
characters.quote: They've offered me a commission in their Navy. I've been requested to report tomorrow morning.

characters.name: Maria
characters.quote: We should really get going.

characters.name: Max Detweiler
characters.quote: It's all arranged.

scenes.name: Interception by Nazi Forces
scenes.summary: As the Von Trapp family attempts to leave, they are intercepted by Nazi soldiers who have come to take the Captain to his new post immediately.
scenes.lastLine: STOP! You will sing, you will all sing. But that is only because I want it to be. I shall escort you myself. Carry on.

characters.name: Captain Von Trapp
characters.quote: We were just going for a walk.

characters.name: Rolf
characters.quote: You are supposed to report for duty for the German Navy tomorrow.

characters.name: Maria
characters.quote: I will miss you all. I wish you could be singing in my festival tonight.

scenes.name: Final Escape to Freedom
scenes.summary: The Von Trapp family makes a daring escape under the cover of their performance at the festival, evading Nazi supervision.
scenes.firstLine: May I present the Salzburg Puppets!

characters.name: Captain Von Trapp
characters.quote: I shall escort you myself. Carry on.

characters.name: Maria
characters.quote: The hills are alive with the sound of music. My heart wants to sing every song it hears.

characters.name: Max Detweiler
characters.quote: This years Salzburg festival winners are...The Family Von Trapp.

locations.name: Nonnberg Abbey
locations.quote: Nuns in black smocks and habits walk calmly across stage. A morning hymn is playing. Nuns in habits walk around with their heads bowed.

locations.name: Von Trapp House
locations.quote: Several maids and servants are busy preparing the house for Captain Von Trapps return.

locations.name: Maria's Room
locations.quote: Maria is in her room in her nightgown. It is thundering out. She is standing over her bed staring uncertain.

locations.name: Salzburg Festival Stage
locations.quote: Lights up on Maxine introduces the next Salzberg contestant. There are various contestants that go on before the Von Trapp family.

locations.name: Salzburg Town Center
locations.quote: Lights up on the town center, bustling with townspeople and the festival atmosphere, as Rolf and Liesl share a secretive moment.

characters.quote: I know but I can't seem to stop myself.  I want to sing all the time.  I can't stop, wherever I am. Even worse, I can't stop saying things things I am thinking or feeling.
characters.explanation: A warm peach color, reflecting Maria's nurturing and caring nature, as well as her vibrant and spirited personality.

characters.quote: I don't care to hear anything further from you about my children!
characters.explanation: A deep steel blue, symbolizing his authority, depth of character, and the melancholy that surrounds his strict demeanor.

characters.quote: Maria, it seems that you will be leaving us for a while.
characters.explanation: A dark brown shade, representing her grounded, wise, and supportive role within the confines of the abbey.

characters.quote: Of course I like you.  I like rich people.  I like the way they live.  I like the way I live when I'm with them.
characters.explanation: A rosy brown color, indicating Max's charming, sociable nature and his role as a facilitator of cultural and social events.

characters.quote: Oh, I am watching my figure, no dinner for me just a light salad.
characters.explanation: A golden yellow, representing her wealth, status, and the polished yet superficial charm she brings to her social interactions.

characters.quote: You are supposed to report for duty for the German Navy tomorrow.
characters.explanation: A cool gray, reflecting Rolf's internal conflict and transformation from a youthful messenger to an instrument of the regime's authority.

characters.quote: I'm Liesl, I'm 16 years old and I don't need a governess.
characters.explanation: A light pink, reflecting her blossoming into young adulthood and her romantic and naive nature.

characters.quote: I'm Kurt. I'm incorrigible.
characters.explanation: A bright orange, illustrating his lively, energetic, and sometimes mischievous personality.

characters.quote: And you're five years old? My, you're practically a lady.
characters.explanation: A khaki shade, symbolizing her youth and the protective affection she receives as the youngest child.

characters.quote: I hope this new infraction ends whatever doubts you may still have about Maria's future here at the Abby.
characters.explanation: A subdued shade of blue, reflecting her conservative and serious nature within the nunnery setting.
